title: Simple But Genius Agricultural Technology: Manual Plow Tool Every Farmer Needs

subtasks: Understand how the manual plow tool works
Learn about the tool's simplicity and portability
Consider using the tool for tilling land
Pick up the tool
Adjust the handle for comfort
Position the tool in the soil
Push the tool through the soil
Repeat for the desired tilling area

tasks.task: Explain the benefits of the manual plow tool
subtasks: Discuss low cost
Highlight ease of use
Point out portability
Emphasize eco-friendliness
